name: Hello World Program
description: A simple program that prints 'Hello, World!' to the console. It is often used as the first program to introduce a programming language.

name: Fibonacci Sequence
description: This program calculates the Fibonacci sequence up to a specified number. It showcases loops and recursion.

name: Factorial Calculation
description: Calculates the factorial of a given number using both iterative and recursive methods. Useful for learning recursion and mathematical calculations.

name: Palindrome Check
description: Checks if a given string or number is a palindrome. This program covers string manipulation and conditional statements.

name: Bubble Sort Algorithm
description: Implements the bubble sort algorithm to sort an array of numbers. It is a simple sorting algorithm suitable for beginners.

name: Prime Number Check
description: A program that checks whether a given number is prime or not. It involves loops and conditional checks.

name: Matrix Multiplication
description: Performs multiplication of two matrices. This program demonstrates the use of nested loops and array manipulation.

name: Greatest Common Divisor (GCD)
description: Calculates the greatest common divisor of two numbers using the Euclidean algorithm. Useful for understanding algorithms and recursion.

name: Binary Search Algorithm
description: Implements the binary search algorithm, which searches for an element in a sorted array. This program demonstrates divide-and-conquer.

name: Swapping Two Numbers
description: A simple program that swaps the values of two variables. Covers basic variable manipulation and arithmetic operations.
